title: PM leaves for flood-affected Sohbatpur district of Balochistan: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 04 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Wednesday that Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif had left for Sohbatpur district of Balochistan.
In a tweet, the minister said that a briefing would be given to him on rehabilitation of flood victims and reconstruction of damaged infrastructure in the area.
وزیرِ اعظم محمد شہباز شریف دورۂ صحبت پور، بلوچستان کے لئے روانہ .سیلاب متاثرین کی بحالی اور تباہ شدہ انفراسٹرکچر کی تعمیر نو پر بریفنگ لیں گے.صحبت پور میں سیلاب سے متاثر ہونے والے گورنمنٹ بوائز سکول کِلی جیا خان کی نئی عمارت کا افتتاح کریں گے.سیلاب زدگان کا سے ملاقات بھی کریں گے
The minister said that the PM would inaugurate the new building of flood-affected Government Boys School in Killi Jaya Khan.
The prime minister will also interact with the flood victims during his visit to Sohbatpur, she said.
